name: sergio
title: Personal Profile
description: I am a professional developer with experience in Frontend/Backend Development, Web Design and DevOps. I am dedicated, creative, efficient, and highly focused on finishing projects with high-quality standards. I have experience in development using React, Sequelize, Express, JavaScript, TypeScript, Jest, Nodejs, React testing library, MySQL, ORM, Responsive Design, Sass, Gulp, PHP, WordPress, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS and other relevant tools. I also have some involvement designing wireframes, mock-ups, email marketing, good handling of Photoshop and Illustrator with experience in commercial environments. My goal is to keep learning to become a better developer.
technologies: Sequelize, MySQL, ORM, express.js, Next.js, React, JavaScript, TypeScript, jest, react testing library, PHP, Wordpress, Github, Node.js, NPM, Gulp, Sass, CSS, HTML, Jira (project management).
